name: Azelf LV.X
author: Shizurow

poke_body.name: Psychic Aura
poke_body.effect: Each of your {P} Pokémon has no Weakness.

attacks.name: Deep Balance
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. Put 1 damage counter on that Pokémon for each Energy attached to all of your opponent’s Pokémon.

rule_box: Put this card onto your Active Azelf. Azelf LV.X can use any attack, Poké-Power, or Poké-Body from its previous level.
